metadata.dc:author: González de Posada, Francisco
metadata.dc:description: In commemoration of International Year of Astronomy (2009, proclaimed by the United Nations (UN) 62nd General Assembly) Galileo's revolutions, named, respectively, astronomic, philosophical, mathematical and theological are considered first. And complementarily the Spanish contributions of the doctor Jose Celestino Mutis and Arturo Duperier to the astrophysics are remembered, in their respective anniversary.
metadata.dc:title: En 2009, Año Internacional de la Astronomía: Galileo, Mutis y Duperier.
[In 2009, International Year of Astronomy: Galileo, Mutis and Duperier].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
